docs.title: FontLab Partners site
docs.text: Publicly available materials (including press kit) for Fontlab Ltd. partners.

docs.title: Downloadable press kit
docs.text:
Download press kit

The FontLab press kit is a ZIP archive (approx. 22 MB) that contains the following folders:

  • company folder: the Fontlab Ltd. company logo as a simple font, and as vector and bitmap graphics
  • fontlab-8 folder: graphical assets for the FontLab 8 professional font editor: app icon, screenshots and additional graphics
  • transtype-4 folder: graphical assets for the TransType 4 font converter: app icon, screenshots and additional graphics

docs.title: License
docs.text:
